public class RandomAI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ai.AI

An AI who is only able to produce a random valid move.

I3anaan

Method Detail

getMove

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getMove()
Checks if a random move is possible, if not it will recheck after randoming again, if the move is valid, it will return it.

Specified by:
getMove in interface ai.AI
Returns:
an ArrayList containing the data of the move the AI wants to do. (x,y,type,color)
